text: this is not
meth that's right this is not meth the
compound feature in this video is a
completely legal off-the-shelf cold
medicine with relatively low abuse
potential YouTube you have zero grounds
to age restrict or demonetize this video
especially because this compound is
nearly impossible for the average person
to synthesize and there is essentially
no way to convert it into Real mess
that said it is pretty much identical to
the real deal to give you some context
for why I'm doing this I am something of
a hobby chemist and as such I have
naturally fantasized about preparing the
Forbidden rock candy but since I'm not a
terminal cancer patient with Nothing
Left to Lose cooking actual meth isn't
exactly something I plan on doing I much
prefer life outside of prison so to
satisfy my compulsive urges I recently
decided to synthesize the closest legal
approximation
this is hydrome methamphetamine
otherwise known as propy hexadin or
benadrex and to the untrained eye it's
pretty hard to discern from ordinary
meth the only real difference is the
presence of a few extra hydrogen atoms
which convert this once powerful
stimulant into a safe and legal
decongestant that can be pulled off the
shelf of any American Walmart and since
this stuff doesn't even count as a
proper amphetamine analog I can
basically spend my whole day
experimenting with it and not get into
any serious legal trouble Patrick not
supposed to experiment with with meth
I'm not cooking meth I'm making bidra
there's no rule against that is there no
guess there
isn't FBI open
up this project technically started
several months ago when I was messing
around on Pub Cam and randomly decided
to look up methamphetamine but with a
cyclohexane ring instead of the usual
Benzene ring this naturally led me to
propy hexadin and upon realizing that I
was a completely unrestricted substance
I decide that I simply had to make some
unfortunately there were only two
established syntheses for this compound
and both were pretty much impossible for
me to attempt the first required
cyclohex acetone which is fairly
difficult to obtain and the second
involved hydrogenating actual
methamphetamine which is obviously
illegal to possess so I set out in
search of a new pathway and after many
sleepless nights of Google searching and
Discord messaging other chemists I
eventually came up with the following
route as a starting material I used the
sodium cyc hexal propane that I had left
over from processing pineapple perfume
in a previous video this was reacted
with hydrochloric acid to yield cyclohex
propionic acid which I subsequently
reduced to cyclohexanol using lithium
aluminum hydride this all went fairly
smoothly and I actually got a pretty
decent yield of the alcohol but then
things started to go downhill my plan
was to dehydrate the alcohol to aloc
cyclohexane using sulfuric acid react
that with hydrobromic acid to get this
intermediate molecule and finally cook
it all together with methylamine to get
propy hexadin this was all based on an
established route that is often used to
make MDMA from saffil and honestly it
probably would have worked really well
if I hadn't used sulfuric acid to
dehydrate the alcohol you see hot
sulfuric acid is basically one of the
most brutal reagents you can use to
convert alcohols into terminal alkenes
and consequently it annihilated pretty
much everything I had I only got a
single milliliter of aloc cyclohexane
from this process and while this did
seem pretty useless I pushed forward
anyway to see if anything interesting
would result long story short I did get
something thing but it was really hard
to say if it was actually propy hexadin
the compound's hydrochloride salt could
dissolve in water and I was able to
freebase out a tiny amount of oily
liquid but I just wasn't very confident
in what I had after the messy sulfuric
acid step and plus I was really hoping
to get a measurable amount of propy
hexadin that could be crystallized in
the traditional manner so I sat on the
project for a few more months
researching the various synthetic
Pathways that existed as an aside it was
actually somewhat difficult to find
useful information on this chemical
partially due to its obscurity and
partially because the media has
saturated the internet with stories
about how dangerous it is to abuse while
the concerns here are valid there is a
lot of sensationalism surrounding drugs
of this type the news landscape in
general is riddled with opinions and
biases that twist the reputation of many
useful substances which is why I'm super
excited to have ground news as a sponsor
they are the world's first news
comparison platform founded by a former
NASA engineer who wanted a more data
driven objective way to stay informed
available through app or website they
pull related news from their database of
over 50,000 Global Sources and organize
them in one place readers can even
compare original research alongside how
the media is covering it for more
comprehensive understanding of the world
around us honestly ground news's mission
aligns perfectly with my original intent
for lab codes to make information easy
to find and put together concisely in
one location as an example check out
this article titled FDA denies approval
for MDMA therapy for PTSD on the right
you can see under coverage details that
40 known sources are covering this topic
and thanks to the bias distribution we
know that a 2% of the articles are
Center leaning in terms of politics
scrolling further it is also possible to
see that the articles are mostly factual
just the way I like it the ownership tab
also provides useful Insight from ground
news about where your information is
coming from so you can judge its
credibility and end up better informed
quickly comparing individual headlines
and assessing how they frame the issue
is also super easy for instance this
article by the conversation is highly
factual in its discussion of MDMA and
the difficulties it faces as a possible
PTSD medication while this headline by
slate is more left-leaning and mostly
theorizes about why the FDA has been
reluctant to adopt this drug emphasizing
passion and calling the science shoddy
go to ground. newslab codes or scan the
QR code to give it a try if you sign up
through my link you'll get 50% off the
Vantage plan which is what I use to get
unlimited access to all the features by
subscribing you're accessing a better
way to read the news and you're also
supporting my work directly as usual the
links are down
below all right after spending some time
researching how similar analoges are
made I eventually came up with a new and
improved pathway which to me seemed a
lot more likely to work it did however
require the following rather lengthy
assortment of ingredients
hydrochloric acid cyclohexylamine
aluminum metal tetrahydrofuran lithium
aluminum hydde 68% nitric acid sulfuric
acid salt xylene Mercury sodium
hydroxide 37% from alahh dichloromethane
nitroethane and finally cyclohexane
carox alahh quite the list huh a big
Thanks goes out to Mah from kelic for
helping me obtain the nitroethane and
alahh he's an all round great guy and if
you want to see how he produced the
nitroethane be sure to check out his
channel which I've linked below to get
things started 33.5 G of nitroethane was
weighed out and added to a 250ml boiling
flask along with 50 g of cyclohexane
carox alahh upon mixing nothing really
happened but this was to be expected for
a reaction to occur a basic catalist of
some kind must be added in my case I
utilize 9 MLL of cyclohexylamine which
caus solution to temporarily become
cloudy based on some other accounts
cyclohexylamine acetate could be a more
favorable catalyst so it's possible that
adding 16 mL of glacial atic acid on top
of all this might lead to better yields
overall once all the ingredients were
mixed in the flask was placed in a hot
water bath and a condenser was connected
to the top the temperature was then
raised to 70° C and held there for 5
hours the reaction that's taking place
here is known as a Henry reaction and
essentially it's just a fancy of linking
a nitroalkane with an alahh which under
these conditions yields a substitute
nitropropane and water normally this
reaction will be run with benald ahid to
yield pheny 2 nitropropane or p2np which
under goes reduction to form amphetamine
while not the most practical precursor
amphetamine can be further processed
into methamphetamine and this is how our
Pathway to propy hexadin takes shape
with the benzal swapped with its
cyclohexane analog cyclohex 2
nitropropane becomes the major product
which can be reduced to nor propyl
hexadin and finally methylated into
propy hexadin pretty sweet right as the
Henry reaction progressed the solution
went from a light straw color to a deep
cherry red and at the same time water
began crashing out indicating that the
reaction was indeed pushing forward once
the 5 hours had elapsed the mixture was
taken off heat and washed with an
arbitrary amount of water to removed the
Amin Catalyst the reddish oil was kept
and then placed on Ice to crystallize
and then this is where I experienced my
first hiccup you see when done with Benz
alahh the p2np usually solidifies into a
cake of lovely yellow crystals however
with the cyclohex 2 nitropropane or C2
NP this didn't really happen I tried
recrystallizing the liquid from various
solvents and even cooling it down to
-40c but nothing ever solidified column
chromatography might have been able to
separate the C2 andp but seriously doing
a column with this much liquid would be
a literal Nightmare and plus I had no
TLC plates or reference data to check so
I would basically have to guess which
fraction the product was in and unlike
last time I couldn't just taste it to
find out in the end I basically just had
to accept that my product was somewhere
in the red oil and move on so for my
next step towards becoming Walter White
I had to perform the main reduction
which would convert any C2 andp that
formed into nor propy hexadin originally
I was planning to use alum amalgam but
according to some sources this type of
reduction requires fairly pure
nitropropane to work and that is
definitely not pure I needed something
that could indiscriminately reduce
whatever I had in solution and for that
I went with lithium aluminum hydride
this stuff is stupidly expensive
surprisingly dangerous and I had already
used up a lot of it during my first
purle hexad attempt but it was really
the only option that I knew wouldn't
fail so to a 1 L boil boiling flask I
added 200 mL of dry
thf then 22 G of lithium aluminum
hydride was carefully added over the
course of several minutes this ended up
being fairly exothermic so the flask was
placed on Ice to cool down once all the
hydride had been painstakingly added a
condenser and addition funnel were set
up and the ladder was charged with 19 G
of crude C2 andp then with strong
stirring the stopcock was carefully
opened to its very minimum setting as
soon as a C2 andp cont Ed the thf
solution a violent reaction occurred and
Vapor began filling the apparatus this
was mostly hydrogen but some flash
boiled nor propyl hexadin ethylamine and
atomized salts were also present now
remember how I said lithium aluminum
hydride couldn't fail well I lied sort
of I actually used way too little
solvent here mostly because I didn't
have a lot to start with and
consequently the reaction ended up being
far too violent this certainly led to
some of the product degrading and
escaping with the hydrogen dissolving
the C2 NP in thf probably would have
helped a lot with this issue but
hindsight is
2020 anyways once all the C2 andp had
been added the solution became very
thick with insoluble lithium and
aluminum salts to fix this and isolate
the nor propyl hexadin I carefully
neutralized the solution with a few
hundred MLL of cold water this caused
the thf to separate and Float to the top
where it was decanted into another flask
boiled down and diluted with water once
again at this point I planned to Ste off
the remaining thf using the water to
help buffer the temperature the only
issue was that I didn't know free based
nor purple hexadin would carry over with
a
distillate fortunately as with most of
life's problems this was readily
overcome with a healthy dose of acid by
adding hydrochloric acid I was
essentially trapping all the amines as
their nonvolatile hydrochloride salts
which could be safely boiled without
carrying over the white smoke seen here
was actually composed of these salts and
it was a good sign that Amin were
present and that the reaction had been
successful the only issue was that the
solution also took on an extremely dark
coloration which obviously had to be
fixed so after boiling off the remaining
thf I allowed the solution to cool and
then washed it twice with
dichloromethane to my delight this
actually did an excellent job pulling
out the colored impurities and the
solution it left me with was almost
completely colorless theoretically this
liquid should have contained all my
precious nor propyl hexadin along with a
bit of ethylamine from unreacted natural
ethane being reduced to be sure though I
had to freebase it now it may not seem
like it but this was actually pretty big
maker break Moment For the synthesis if
an insoluble liquid formed after adding
Aquis sodium hydroxide it would mean the
nor purple hexadin had most likely been
created and that I could move on to the
final step but if nothing separated it
would mean I would have to go back to
the drawing board thankfully
though I did get a precipitate it took a
while to separate but it did eventually
turn into an oily liquid with a very
mild aing smell that reminded me of
grass or plant material this seems to be
fairly common among similar analogs with
the usual comparison being geranium
leaves so this was a promising sign the
only problem I had was with my yield if
the 18.8 G of C2 andp had been pure and
the reduction had gone flawlessly I
would have gotten close to 18 G of
norpro hexadin in reality though I only
obtained about 5 G which corresponds to
a yield of roughly
28% not exactly a number I'm proud of
but I suppose things could have been a
lot
worse all right at this point I had over
90% of the purple hexagen molecule
complete at least in terms of molecular
mass from what I could tell I had
successfully produced the legal version
of regular amphetamine and now all I had
to do was convert it into the legal
equivalent of
methamphetamine and based on what I had
read this actually wouldn't be that hard
to do all I needed was a little bit of
mercury and Malahide Hold Up Wait A
Minute yeah don't worry there was no way
I was ever going to test this stuff on
myself aside from propy hexadin being a
relatively unpleasant drug to abuse
making it from nor propop hexadin tends
to be a very toxic process form Malahide
is one of the most notorious
cancer-causing chemicals in existence
and the Mercury salts that are used
alongside it could easily cause
irreversible neurotoxic effects at best
the propy hexogen would end up
reasonably pure and only only ruin my
day but at worst it could easily ruin my
life the choice was pretty obvious to
clear up exactly why I need such toxic
ingredients here's the pathway I decided
to follow form Malahide participates in
a condensation reaction with the amine
group on Nory hexagen to form this
intermediate amine molecule which can be
reduced to a methylamine group using
aluminum amalgam this whole process is
technically a type of reductive
amination and there are actually a bunch
of different reducing agents that could
be used instead of the amalgam the three
main ones I had access to were sodium
borohydride plaum on carbon with
hydrogen and of course lithium aluminum
hydride the issue was that these were
all quite expensive and my pum Catalyst
seemed to be mostly poisoned by previous
syntheses rendering it useless until I
could get around to cleaning it while
toxic the amalgam was Far cheaper and
much less flammable than the other
options to make it though I first had to
get my mercury into solution to do this
I moved everything into a fume Hood for
ventilation and added half a gram of
liquid mercury to round bottom flask
then on top of this half a mL of
concentrated nitric acid was shot in
this quickly began to attack the metal
converting it into water soluble
mercuric nitrate and reddish brown
nitrogen dioxide gas as this was
happening roughly 10 m of methanol was
added to the nor purple hexadin followed
by 2.5 M of aquous 37% form alahh this
seemed to cause a cloudy precipitate to
form but it quickly cleared up with a
little stirring by the time this was
done the Mercury had completely
dissolved and the solution was diluted
with water then to kick things off 9 G
of shredded aluminum foil was added and
the solution was gently swirled almost
immediately the aluminum began to darken
and tarnish and if you look closely you
can even see hydrogen evolving and
puffing up the mixture since I had never
tried this particular reaction before
this kind of caught me off guard and I
quickly poured in the form aldhy mixture
hoping to catch the aluminum before the
water reacted with it too significantly
this caused things to intensify pretty
rapidly and in my rush I forgot to add a
condenser to the top of the flask while
I did add it eventually this mistake
cost me a decent amount of my product
which was carried away with the hydrogen
and alcohol Vapor as the solution boiled
I was honestly pretty worried that would
recover nothing from this whole
procedure but that all changed after I
washed and emptied the flask contents
into a
beaker it's kind of hard to see but
there were actually small droplets of an
oily liquid suspended on the water
surface which could have only been propy
hexadin or unreacted nor purple
hexagen actually it could have been a
lot of different things but let's just
pretend the chemistry behaved itself
perfectly up until this point any
insoluble nitroethane or alahh would
have been reduced to soluble ethylamine
and cyclohexanol by the lithium aluminum
hydride along with the nitropropane
which was brightly colored unlike our
solution so either this was an insoluble
free based aiming compound or I just
found a really convoluted way to
generate really clean
tar now the typical meth method for
isolating amines like this is to
dissolve the oil in a non-polar solvent
and then acidify the mixture to crush
out the product as a salt in my case I
washed the solution twice with xylene to
collect the oil and then set up a
hydrogen chloride generator to perform
the
acidification saturated salt solution
was loaded into the main flask of the
generator concentrated sulfuric acid was
added to the addition funnel and a hose
was led into another flask with the
xylene solution containing the oil as
soon as the sulfuric acid was dripped in
a widish haste could be seen coming off
the xylene again this was a good
indication that amines were present and
sure enough the solution became cloudy
with precipitate after just a few
minutes unexpectedly though the
precipitate turned out to be a liquid
after it was allowed to settle
practically all Aman hydrochlorides are
solids at room temperature so this was
quite unusual I figured that the
hydrogen chloride had just carried over
some water but upon boiling the liquid
down all I had left was a sticky goo
that kind of smell grassy and aiming
like I tried everything to get this
stuff solidified including several
solvent Washings to remove impurities
but nothing seemed to work in the end my
final yield was a soul crushing 1 M of
uncrystallizable gooey stuff a far cry
from the several grams of crystals that
I'd originally hoped for and worst of
all I had no way of knowing if there was
even prople hexagen present it's totally
possible that this stuff was mostly my
product and that I was all being kept
semisolid and Amorphis by a few specific
impurities but without an NMR or or
other form of analysis I couldn't say
for sure the smell and fact that it
could be free based were basically the
only things I had to work off of for a
while I seriously considered scrapping
this project I'm fine posting my
failures but when things go this bad I
don't usually bother in this case though
I had dumped so much time and money into
the synthesis that I just couldn't bring
myself to delete it from
existence and boy am I glad that I
didn't after thinking about it for a
while I decided to try one final test to
see if propyl hexogen was present an
over-the-counter drug test the active
methylamine group on propyl hexogen is
identical to that of methamphetamine
meaning it can trip for meth on a basic
test of course this particular variety
is made for analyzing urine so to test
my sample I needed to make some fake
urine to do this I diluted a single drop
of the free based oil in 50 mL of water
and then adjusted the pH with dilute
solution of hydrochloric acid and sodium
bicarbonate optionally I could have
added a bunch of Ura and other salts to
better match the real deal but that
wouldn't have really affected the
outcome of this type of test so I poured
my homemade drug pee into the test cup
crossed my fingers and peeled off the
label at first I almost couldn't believe
what I was seeing the drug test was
showing positive results for not only
meth but also PCP and MDMA both meth and
MDMA are secondary amines with methy
groups like propy hexadin so this was
exactly what I was hoping to see what
made me even happier though was the fact
that the regular amphetamine test was
negative meaning all of the noral hexin
had been successfully methylated to the
final product obviously there were no
opioids cannabinoids or cocaine present
but the PCP positive was a bit strange
at first I thought this might have been
caused by the cyclohexane ring which
both molecules share but that didn't
really make much sense due to its highly
unreactive nature the usual molecules
that trip for PCP including Benadryl and
ketamine are usually tertiary amines so
it seems likely that excess form aldhy
over methylated some of my product
yielding and methylpropyl hexadin which
could be similar enough to fool the test
in an attempt to be totally sure of what
I had I tried mailing the drug test to
the address listed on the box I was
hoping that the lab will be able to tell
me what specific drugs were present in
my fake urine but all I got back was
confirmation that there wasn't any real
meth or other illegal drugs present at
least now I have proof for the FBI
agents watching that I didn't actually
make anything
illegal all right I think that's just
about everything I've got for this
synthesis in the future I would like to
try making propy hexagen again using the
much cleaner cyoh hexal acetone pathway
but that might not be for a while the
dream of a clean crystalline product
isn't dead but it is taking a long nap
in the meantime I I have plenty of other
projects to keep me busy for example I
recently hit 100,000 subscribers and to
celebrate I set out to make one of the
most dangerous elements in existence
Florine gas be sure to stay tuned for
that video's release in which I
definitely do not die as usual a huge
Thanks goes out to all the existing lab
codes patrons without their help I
wouldn't be able to make cool videos
like this seriously there was no way I
could have afforded all the reagents for
this project it was ridiculous
remember to like share and subscribe and
I'll catch you next time lab coats out
